summary:
Columbia University, located in New York City, is one of the oldest and most prestigious universities in the United States. Founded in 1754 as King's College, it was renamed Columbia College after the American Revolution. The university moved to its current campus in 1896.

Columbia has 20 schools, offering various undergraduate and graduate programs. It is known for its research, especially in science, and has produced many important discoveries. The university has a long list of notable alumni, including U.S. presidents, Nobel laureates, and Olympic medalists. Columbia is also famous for administering the Pulitzer Prize.
title: Columbia University
